import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, r''C:\\Users\\Amirkhan\\Documents\\VS Code\\VidGen''\)

from models.replicate_client import ReplicateClient

print\(''=''*60\)
print\(''REPLICATE API TEST''\)
print\(''=''*60\)

# Create client
print\(''Creating Replicate client...''\)
client = ReplicateClient\(\)
print\(''Client created!''\)

# Generate a test image
print\(''\\nGenerating test image...''\)
print\(''Prompt: A red apple on a wooden table, photorealistic''\)
print\(''\(This may take 10-30 seconds...\)''\)

url = client.generate_image\(
    ''A red apple on a wooden table, photorealistic, studio lighting'',
    aspect_ratio=''1:1''
\)
print\(f''\\nGenerated image URL: {url}''\)

# Download it
save_path = r''C:\\Users\\Amirkhan\\Documents\\VS Code\\VidGen\\output\\test_image.png''
print\(f''\\nDownloading to: {save_path}''\)
client.download_image\(url, save_path\)
print\(''Downloaded!''\)

print\(''\\n'' + ''=''*60\)
print\(''SUCCESS! Replicate API is working.''\)
print\(''Check the image at: output/test_image.png''\)
print\(''=''*60\)
")
